work-item.field:
• Project Groups = Folders which can contain projects
    • Project = Container to manage product or project related information
      • Space = Folder which can contain documents or wiki pages
        • Document = Can contain work items. Provides an easy way to organize work items in an easy to read view
          • Work item = smallest entity in the system. Think of it as a single row in an excel table or a paragraph in a document  
        • Wiki page = Used for reporting and to guide end user through the process
A project can contain three essential artifacts

• Documents are containers for work items
  • Work items can be contained in documents or directly in the project
  • Wiki pages are used to display content and to guide the user through the system
